page.title: 08Stone Masons
page.content: The{Stone Masons}is situated near {Redfield Edge}which is a primary school near to{S.B.L.}It is owned by a man called Alan Tancock and has had the buisness now for fourteen years and he also lives on the premises. The kind of things they make are Ornaments, Paving Slabs and walling blocks and they are all sold to the public or buisness contractors as far away as Worcester. The number of staff he employs depends on the steason; most of the year he employs one or two, but in April to September he will employ as many as six men. There also is a very old building on the premises which is said to have been a cobblers shop nearly 100 years ago.
